actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration, H. Rept. 93-1572.

official_title: Resolution authorizing the printing of additional copies of a report issued by the Committee on Foreign Affairs.

summary.text: Provides for the printing for use by the Committee on Foreign Affairs of the House of Representatives of 500 copies of a report of the Subcommittee on International Organizations and Movements entitled, "Problems of Protecting Civilians Under International Law in the Middle East Conflict".

titles.title: Resolution authorizing the printing of additional copies of a report issued by the Committee on Foreign Affairs.
